title: 84/314/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 May 1984 on the lodging of applications for the premium for maintaining suckler cows in Ireland in respect of the 1984/85 marketing year (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 28 May 1984
on the lodging of applications for the premium for maintaining suckler cows in Ireland in respect of the 1984/85 marketing year
(Only the English text is authentic)
(84/314/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Ireland is hereby authorized, in respect of the 1984/85 marketing year, to set 15 May 1984 as the beginning of the period during which applications for the premium for suckler cows are to be lodged.
This Decision shall apply without prejudice to the other provisions of Regulation (EEC) No 1244/82.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 May 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
